response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I believe it would also significantly benefit you, given its worth of $800,000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer not only provides you with an exceptional value but also allows us to explore the potential for a mutually beneficial relationship. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
